alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hyde (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:54PM MDT until June 29 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hand County in central South Dakota... East central Hyde County in central South Dakota... Northeastern Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 654 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Miller Dale Colony, or 10 miles southwest of Miller, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Miller around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include St. Lawrence, Vayland and Burdette. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
